description: Number of employees in each department or sister agency who owe funds to the City. For each department, the dataset provides the following as of the date noted: total number of individuals employed by the department or agency, number of individuals that owe funds to the City in the department; and the total amount of debt owed by those employees. Data Owner: Revenue. Time Period: mid-October 2011 to present. Frequency: Data is updated weekly.

name: Employee Indebtedness to the City of Chicago
